0: God standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods.
1: How long will ye judge unjustly, and accept the persons of the wicked? Selah.
2: Defend the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.
3: Deliver the poor and needy: rid them out of the hand of the wicked.
4: They know not, neither will they understand; they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth are out of course.
5: I have said, Ye are gods; and all of you are children of the most High.
6: But ye shall die like men, and fall like one of the princes.
7: Arise, O God, judge the earth: for thou shalt inherit all nations.
